title: Friday Fun Show! Broncos-Colts TNF Recap + Final Predictions for Week 5
itunes:title: Friday Fun Show! Broncos-Colts TNF Recap + Final Predictions for Week 5
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Patrick Claybon share their final thoughts before a weekend of football action. First, we recap the Colts-Broncos Thursday night matchup. Dan takes over "The Floor is Yours" (which is now called "It's About Me!") with a message for Broncos fans. We take feedback and questions from the live listeners, and finally hit the last nuts and bolts leading into Week 5 with predictions for this weekend.

The Friday Fun Show airs live on YouTube at 10am PT/1pm ET/6pm BST every Friday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
